response.original_title: 心霊写真と心霊映像 ベストセレクション
response.overview: This is the best edition of the "Shinrei Shashin to Shinrei Eizō" series, which has continued to introduce ghost photographs and ghost images over the past 13 films. From among those that have received a favorable response from viewers, 15 ghost photos and 25 ghost images have been carefully selected and included, which even the experts who were asked to appraise them were troubled by the true identity of the shadows.
response.title: Shinrei Shashin to Shinrei Eizō: Best Selection

titles.title: 心霊世界全集 心霊写真と心霊映像 ベストセレクション
